definition: Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
Taoist monastery/palace gate watchtower/platform
surname Guan
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
dyke/embankment/pool or pond/hot-water bathing pool

sentences.english: You can fish in the harbors of Kowloon, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kwun Tong or the Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在港口魚九龍尖沙咀或觀塘香港島。

sentences.english: The bulk of the archival holding is held at the Hong Kong Public Records Building in Kwun Tong, Kowloon.
sentences.chinese: 歷史文獻大部分存放於九龍觀塘的香港歷史檔案大樓。

sentences.english: Barn Swallow nest at Kwun Tong is now raising the second brood this year.
sentences.chinese: 觀塘市中心的一個家燕巢，今天已在育第二窩了。

sentences.english: These social costs must be ascribed to the Kwun Tong project.
sentences.chinese: 這些社會成本，亦應納入觀塘重建項目之內。

sentences.english: Five young men have been arrested after an illegal car race in Kwun Tong.
sentences.chinese: 五名年輕男子在觀塘非法賽車後版拘捕。
